title: Implement footer with keyboard hints
description:
Implement renderFooter() function:

Format (single line, centered):
'q:quit  p:pause  j/k:nav  tab:pane  ^d/u:scroll  ?:help'

Styling:
- Gray text for all hints
- Keys slightly bolder or different shade
- Separated by double space
- Centered in available width

Dynamic hints based on state:
- When paused: show 'p:resume' instead of 'p:pause'
- When in help overlay: show 'esc:close'
- When in completion: show 'q:quit' only

Use help.Model from bubbles for consistent formatting.
Implement ShortHelp() in keyMap to return footer bindings.
closed_reason: Implemented renderFooter() with custom format (q:quit p:pause j/k:nav tab:pane ^d/u:scroll ?:help). Keys rendered bold with footerStyle.Bold(true), descriptions use footerStyle (gray/colorOverlay). Dynamic hints: completion shows only q:quit, help overlay shows ?:close, paused shows p:resume. Footer centered in available width using lipgloss.Width calculation. Updated ShortHelp() to return matching order for help.KeyMap interface consistency.
